body_html:
Thank you auxsophia for your advice, I tried that and now my error becomes:
2018󈚧󈚴 03:55:51.413954: F .tensorflow/stream_executor/lib/statusor.h:212] Couldn't open CUDA library libcupti.so.8.0. LD_LIBRARY_PATH: /lib64::/usr/local/cuda.0/extras/lib64

And my file was actually libcublas.so.8.0 not the libcupti.so.8.0. Does this indicate some error in cuda installation? Thanks very much.

And my file was actually libcublas.so.8.0 not the libcupti.so.8.0. Does this indicate some error in cuda installation? Thanks very much.
